sub_title: Consultant at Korn Ferry | Organization Design & Strategy Execution
summary:
I am currently working as Consultant at Korn Ferry. Korn Ferry is an international advisory firm and together with management teams we aim to make their strategy specific and concrete. Most organizations can come up with a sound strategy, but many struggle to make it stick because their talent and strategy aren’t in sync. That is where we come in. We help you hire, motivate, and hold on to the best people to bring your strategy to life.

As Consultant I am part of the Young Talents team in our Amsterdam office. I am working on challenging projects for high profile organizations from all our disciplines. I work closely with senior consultants during the proposal and delivery phase of projects related to job evaluation, organization design, and strategy execution.

Combining my role as Consultant with my Hospitality background, I integrate a strong customer focus with an analytical mindset. I like to anticipate on people’s needs and exceed expectations in my collaboration with clients.

education.field_of_study: Business administration / Bedrijfskunde / Business management / Bedrijfsmanagement

profile_positions.description: As Consultant I am part of the Young Talents team in our Amsterdam office. I am working on challenging projects for high profile organizations from all our disciplines. I work closely with senior consultants during the proposal and delivery phase of projects related to job evaluation, organization design, and strategy execution.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description: Korn Ferry is an international advisory firm and together with management teams we aim to make their strategy specific and concrete. We work with our clients to design optimal organization structures, roles, and responsibilities. We help them hire the right people and advise them on how to reward and motivate their workforce while developing professionals as they navigate and advance their careers. Our goal is to synchronize strategy and people to drive superior performance.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Financial institutions such as banks are expected to know who their clients are to make sure that their services are not misused. During my work as a Client Acceptance and Administration Expert at Knab I made risk assessments of potential and existing customers in order to ensure this. When unusual behaviour or transactions came to light, the relevant customer was identified and the unusual activities were reported internally. Within that context, I made decisions based on what we are obliged to do by law and regulations and I tried to satisfy the needs of our customers. Other responsibilities include optimizing internal processes, planning an participating in monthly meetings and training new employees in our team.

During my time at Knab I successfully obtained my Wft (Financial Supervision Act) and my Wwft (Anti-Money Laundering and Anti-Terrorist Financing Act) certificates.

Average workload of 16-24 hours per week
profile_positions.title: Client Acceptance and Administration Expert

profile_positions.description:
SOLVE Consulting is a student organization affiliated with Erasmus University Rotterdam, VU University Amsterdam and Utrecht University. We advise organizations to make them operate more efficiently and effectively. By offering knowledge and entrepreneurship to young talent, SOLVE strives to increase the social impact of organizations and thus contribute to the creation of a better society. In doing so, we build a bridge between ambitious socially engaged students and diverse issues of organizations. You make social impact together. High quality, a fresh perspective and creativity are central to this.

In addition, we are guided by our corporate partners, an Advisory Board as well as experts from the field. SOLVE consists of approximately 90 ambitious university bachelor and master students who are involved in advising socially involved organizations and more than 100 projects have already been successfully completed. The consultancy teams have an interdisciplinary composition, consisting of students with diverse study backgrounds and skills.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description:
During a period of 5 months, I fulfilled the position of Concept Development Intern.  Next to my daily tasks I was involved in many different concept development processes: Market research, brainstorm sessions on new concepts, concept creation and development, concept design, selecting operating equipment for a restaurant, pre-opening assistance.

In the first ten weeks, I helped with several projects throughout Europe. These ten weeks were meant to become familiar with H-Hospitality’s way of working and their vision on concept development, together with their detailed, refined in-house design style of deliverables to clients. I also had the opportunity to join the meetings that we had in the office, where I mainly observed and made notes. After having joined several meetings I was allowed to have own meetings with suppliers as well. After 10 weeks I was handed my own project, besides contributing to the other projects running at that time as well. 

Projects involved in: Vetro Vero Frankfurt, Hampshire Lancaster Hotel Amsterdam East (The Birdhouse), The Bridge Warsaw, NENI Amsterdam, MGallery Wroclaw.
profile_positions.title: Concept Development Intern

profile_positions.description:
During my time as a charity ambassador I was responsible for arranging, organizing and managing the location of a Craft Beer Festival, as well as the event on the evening itself. The other ambassadors and I have put our heart and soul in arranging the second edition of The Craft Beer Festival and raised a total amount of: €6.410. | Average workload of 24 hours a week.

Charity foundation BeneKids (before CF School of Life) supports Hotel con Corazon, a charity organisation founded back in 2008 by two eager entrepreneurs who came up with a solution to one of the worlds largest problems; lack of educational support around the globe.

By building Hotel con Corazon in different cities and countries, the community and their children are helped. Through operating these hotels, Hotel con Corazon gains revenues and profits of which 75% returns directly to the local community. By supporting children with their education, their future opportunities will enlarge and enrich.
profile_positions.title: Ambassador

volunteer_experiences.description:
Charity foundation BeneKids (before CF School of Life) supports Hotel con Corazon, a charity organisation founded back in 2008 by two eager entrepreneurs who came up with a solution to one of the worlds largest problems; lack of educational support around the globe.

By building Hotel con Corazon in different cities and countries, the community and their children are helped. Through operating these hotels, Hotel con Corazon gains revenues and profits of which 75% returns directly to the local community. By supporting children with their education, their future opportunities will enlarge and enrich.

During this period I have in charge of the arranging and managing of the location of the Craft Beer Festival. Me and the other ambassadors have put our heart and soul in arranging the second edition of The Craft Beer Festival and raised a total amount of: €6.410,-.
